means: 持久的，耐用的( durable的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Consumer durables such as refrigerators, television sets, bicycles and so on were produced in large quantities.
sentence.Network_cn: 冰箱、电视、自行车等耐用消费品被大批量地生产出来。

sentence.Network_en: Running at 50 - year lows below trend. Move from durables to services consumption could be big.
sentence.Network_cn: 在低于趋势线的50年最低水平下, 从耐用品消费到服务消费的转变可能很大.

sentence.Network_en: The table below shows the consumer durables owned in Britain from 1972 to 1983.
sentence.Network_cn: 该图表展现的是1972-1983十一年间英国耐久消费品的拥有量.
